code: import React from'react';import{Box,Typography,Card,IconButton,Tooltip}from'@mui/material';import DeleteIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Delete';import ContentCopyIcon from'@mui/icons-material/ContentCopy';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SavedPalettes=_ref=>{let{palettes,onDelete,onCopy}=_ref;if(!palettes||palettes.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{textAlign:'center',mt:4},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",color:"text.secondary",children:"No saved palettes yet"})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{mt:4},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h5",sx:{mb:2,fontWeight:600},children:"Saved Palettes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{display:'grid',gap:2,gridTemplateColumns:{xs:'1fr',sm:'1fr 1fr',md:'1fr 1fr 1fr'}},children:palettes.map((palette,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{sx:{p:2,background:'linear-gradient(145deg, #ffffff 0%, #f8f9fa 100%)'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{mb:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"subtitle1",sx:{fontWeight:600,mb:1},children:palette.name||"Palette ".concat(index+1)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body2",color:"text.secondary",sx:{mb:2},children:palette.prompt})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',gap:1,mb:2},children:palette.colors.map((color,colorIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{flex:1,height:'40px',backgroundColor:color,borderRadius:1,cursor:'pointer',position:'relative','&:hover':{transform:'scale(1.05)',transition:'transform 0.2s ease-in-out'}},onClick:()=>onCopy(color)},colorIndex))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'flex-end',gap:1},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:"Delete palette",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{size:"small",onClick:()=>onDelete(palette.id),sx:{color:'error.main'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteIcon,{})})})})]},index))})]});};export default SavedPalettes;
